about: Recommends the best crop based on soil and climate inputs like N, P, K, pH, temperature, humidity, and rainfall.
Simple and responsive web interface for easy user interaction.
Uses a trained machine learning model for accurate crop predictions.
Real-time results help farmers make informed cultivation decisions.
Designed for scalability with potential future features like weather APIs.
performance: 93% accuracy in crop prediction using Random Forest Classifier.
Average response time of < 1 second per crop recommendation.
Web interface loads fully in under 2 seconds on 3G networks.
Tested and works smoothly on Chrome, Firefox, and mobile browsers.
Final trained model size is < 1MB, ideal for lightweight deployment.
Less than 1% input error rate after frontend validation improvements.

card.description: Crop Recommendation System Using Machine Learning
